Sentence: Five of these were caused by mutations predicted to produce a truncated protein: ( i) a sporadic case showed a 32 bp deletion in exon 11, and a mutant mRNA without exon 11 was produced; the normal exon 10 was also spliced out; ( ii) a sporadic case had a 1 bp deletion in exon 12 ( 1634delT); ( iii) a TSC2 - linked mother and daughter pair had a G - - > T transversion in exon 23 ( G2715T) introducing a cryptic splice site causing a 29 bp truncation of mRNA from exon 23; ( iv) a sporadic case showed a 2 bp deletion in exon 36; ( v) a sporadic case showed a 1 bp insertion disrupting the donor splice site of exon 37 ( 5007 + 2insA), resulting in the use of an upstream exonic cryptic splice site to cause a 29 bp truncation of mRNA from exon 37.
